setImageResource(int).Description: Sets an optional image to be displayed on top of the button.

Parameters: boolean: True if this view is enabled, false otherwise.
setEnabled(boolean).Description: Set the enabled state of this view. The interpretation of the enabled state varies by subclass.

onLayout(boolean, int, int, int, int).FullName: void onLayout (boolean changed, int l, int t, int r, int b)

setImageScaleMode(int).Description: Sets the scaling mode used for the optional image. Must be one of:

setColor(int).Description: Sets the color of the circular button.

setColor(android.content.res.ColorStateL.Description: Sets the colors for the circular button.

setText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets the text of the action label.

ClassDesc: with Android Wear 2.0 it is recommended to use the android.support.wear.widget.drawer.WearableActionDrawerView for navigation and the https:##developer#android#com@B_android#support#wearable#view#ConfirmationOverlay_E@ for confirmation actions in particular. Displays a circular button, with an optional image to perform an action. On round devices the button is centered within the page, and is slightly above center on square devices. An ActionLabel is included centered within the space between the bottom of the button and the bottom of the page, using up to two lines of text if necessary.
